attributes.action: Give full rights and ownership of children to their parents. And not the state
attributes.background: The rights and ownership of our children should belong to their parents not the state. As when you register your child’s birth they become property of the state. This is wrong  the rights and ownership of any child should be their parents

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "Give full rights and ownership of children to their parents. And not the state". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
